definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Board Sailing is now one of the events in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 如今風浪板已成爲奧運會的正式競賽項目之一。

sentences.english: Board Sailing is a surf board with a sail.
sentences.chinese: 風浪板就是有帆的衝浪板。
